alert.note: Alert for Phelps; Pulaski (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 4:46PM CDT until May 13 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Pulaski County in central Missouri... Southwestern Phelps County in east central Missouri... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 446 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Fort Leonard Wood, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eastern Fort Leonard Wood... Edgar Springs... Beulah... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
